channel.title: Runescape PS Minimum requirements: Low end VPS
channel.description:
Do you think a guaranteed 256MB/ 512burst Linux vps is sufficient enough to run a Private server? It's not going to be public yet, but I was just planning to play with maybe 10 people for now.
I am planing to run it on CentOS (With minimal GUI XFCE? i forgot the name but i know how to set it up) because it's lightweight and follow this guide http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,367407.0.html
Is it possible?

item.title: Runescape PS Minimum requirements: Low end VPS
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Park Mod Park
item.description:
@Mod_Park wrote:

Aite thanks for the info peeps. Maybe I’d set up a PS using Hamachi since it’s just gonna be for my friends and we gon log in once in a while.

Read full topic
item.source: Runescape PS Minimum requirements: Low end VPS

item.title: Runescape PS Minimum requirements: Low end VPS
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

The lag will be crazy if it was over 20 people. My old computer has 256mb RAM and it lagged at 20-30 people. I had to have everything closed besides the client and the server. And if I loaded something the server would freeze and lag everyone… But for 10 people it will work.

Read full topic
item.source: Runescape PS Minimum requirements: Low end VPS

item.title: Runescape PS Minimum requirements: Low end VPS
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Most likely, I wouldn’t try hosting a big server though.

Read full topic
item.source: Runescape PS Minimum requirements: Low end VPS

yes, it will work… i doubt the client will run on it though
